errors.emojiError: I need the `Use External Emojis` permission in order for me to operate. Please, request that an admin activates it so that I can work :)
errors.linkError: I need the `Send Links` permission in order for me to operate. Please, request that an admin activates it so that I can work :)
errors.dmError: Sorry, but I can't send direct messages yet :(
errors.commandNotFound: Oops, I couldn't find the command `[command]`. Did you mean something like `[alt]`?

mention.title: Who calls me?
mention.line1: Oh, hello [username], how are you? My name is [me].
mention.line2: Well, if you wanna know my function, it is help your server in many creatives and different ways!
mention.line3: Maybe you don't know my prefix on this server and that's why you called me. If that is your question, it is `[prefix]`.
mention.line4: Se você tiver alguma sugestão ou tiver encontrado algum parafuso meu perdido por aí, entre no meu [servidor de suporte]([url]) para falar com meu criador.
mention.line5: Se quiser me adicionar em seu servidor, basta clicar [aqui]([url])!
mention.line6: E por fim, obrigada por me chamar. Foi ótimo te explicar quem sou <3
